argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tendo0.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | tendo0.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 3 |  | tendo0.t | |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | tendo0.e | |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) |
| 5 |  | tendo0.o | |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) |
| 6 |  | tendo0pl.p | |- P = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_tendo0cl | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> O e. E ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> O e. E ) |
| 9 | 2, 3, 4, 6 | #P_tendoplcom | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E /\ O e. E ) -> ( S P O ) = ( O P S ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> ( S P O ) = ( O P S ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_tendo0pl | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> ( O P S ) = S ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> ( S P O ) = S ) |
